Instructions.Name: Mrc
Instructions.Description: Move from processor register to coprocessor

Instructions.Name: Mcr
Instructions.Description: Move from coprocessor to processor register

Instructions.Name: Ldm
Instructions.Description: Block transfer multiple registers from memory

Instructions.Name: Stm
Instructions.Description: Block transfer multiple registers to memory

Instructions.Name: Pop
Instructions.Description: Pop multiple registers off the stack

Instructions.Name: Push
Instructions.Description: Push multiple registers onto the stack

Instructions.Name: VMrs_APSR
Instructions.Description: Read Floating-Point Control Register into APSR

Instructions.Name: VLdr
Instructions.Description: Loads a single extension register from memory

Instructions.Name: VStr
Instructions.Description: Stores a single extension register to memory
